PersonAcademicCredential.name: PersonAcademicCredential
PersonAcademicCredential.description: Represents an Academic Credential that a person has earned.

AcademicCredentialId.description: The Academic Credential that's associated with the Person Academic Credential.

AchievedDate.description: The date that the Contact achieved the Academic Credential.

CredentialName.description: The name of the Academic Credential.

CredentialType.description: Specifies the type of Academic Credential.

IssuerName.description: The institution that grants the Academic Credential.

LearnerContactId.description: The Contact person associated with the Person Academic Credential.

Name.description: The name of the Person Academic Credential.
